name: Sole Light: Isometric Puzzles
description:
Sole Light: Isometric Puzzles is an addictive puzzle game with isometric controls and dazzling graphics that will allow you to relax and calm your mind.
If you’re a fan of match 3 games, puzzle games, logic games, and relaxing games, Sole Light is the perfect choice. To complete various difficulty levels in this wonderful game, you will have to prove your mettle in intelligence and perceptiveness. You will control a single hero or multiple heroes and progress through subsequent levels by being smart and moving objects encountered on your way. Have fun with our logical puzzle game starting now!

Key functionalities in Sole Light: Isometric Puzzles:

✔️ Beautiful climatic music
✔️ Relaxing and addictive gameplay
✔️ Unique graphics ❤️‍🔥
✔️ Well-structured game mechanics
✔️ Various difficulty levels
✔️ The game requires thinking and perceptiveness
✔️ Easy controls in isometric mode
✔️ A relaxing game that you will want to keep coming back to in your spare time . Sole Light will allow you to enjoy some well-deserved relaxation and forget about your daily routine.

If you enjoy playing relaxing puzzles, match 3 puzzle games are the right place to be. Sole Light: Isometric Puzzles is what you’ve been searching for! Have fun completing subsequent levels!
